#summary data exchange format for ajax
#labels Phase-Design

= Introduction =
ajax.php interface data exchange format for ajax 

= Details =
*use double quote, not single quote, as php json_decode does so*

== html sample ==

=== delete a comment (sysop only) ===
{{{
<div id="comments">
  <!-- some -->
  <div id="comment-100">
    <p class="comment-header">标题 by 用户名<span class="comment-ip">(IP: 127.0.0.1)</span> at 时间 <a class="comment-del" href="deleteThisComment()">(DELETE)</a></span></p><p class="comment-body">SPAM!</p>
  </div>
  <!-- more -->
</div>
}}}

 * -> `data={"action":"del","cid":100}`
 * <- `{"$1"}`

{{{
<div id="comments">
  <!-- some -->
  $1
  <!-- more -->
</div>
}}}
=== post a comment ===
{{{
<div id="comments">
  <!-- all -->
</div>
<div id="post-comment">
  <!-- some form -->
  <!-- more form -->
</div>
}}}

 * -> `data={"action":"captcha"}`
 * <- `{"$1"}`

{{{
<div id="comments">
  <!-- all -->
</div>
<div id="post-comment">
  <!-- some form -->
  $1
  <!-- more form -->
</div>
}}}
 
 * -> `data={"action":"post","eid":12321,"title":"标题","body":"内容","captcha":"123"}`
 * <- `{"$2"}`

{{{
<div id="comments">
  <!-- all -->
  $2
</div>
<div id="post-comment">
  <!-- some form -->
  <!-- more form -->
</div>
}}}
